description: The Push Button Reset (PBR) partition is an effective way to manage recovery options through Windows installation. It enables users to restore their system to factory settings with a simple push of a button, without the need for additional installation media. This tool minimizes downtime during critical recovery situations and can be particularly beneficial for system administrators managing multiple devices. The underlying functionality involves using DiskPart scripts to identify and configure recovery partitions effectively. For further details on setting up a PBR partition, refer to the Microsoft documentation.
